title: The Gilded Cage of the Muse
tagline: In the shadow of the Emperor, four poets discover that words can build empires or destroy lives.

chapters.title: The Price of a Perfect Couplet

story: Write a 'lost' poem by Ovid from within the novel, one deemed too dangerous for the Emperor's contest, exploring a private grief masked as mythology.
Draft the private correspondence between the patron Messalla and a political rival, discussing his 'stable' of poets as strategic assets.
Create the journal entries of the tavern keeper Lucius, observing the poets' decline from inspired madmen to cautious courtiers.
Script a dramatic scene where the four poets confront each other in the Subura tavern after one has seen the final, censored version of his inscribed poem.
technical: Build a text analysis tool that compares the 'public' inscribed verses of the poets with fragments of their earlier, private work, highlighting linguistic markers of censorship or self-editing.

Design an interactive map of Augustan Rome marking key locations from the novel (The Grateful Sparrow, Messalla's house, the Forum building site) with pop-ups containing relevant historical context and fictional excerpts.

cover_prompt: A single, elegant hand, smeared with both dark ink and flecks of gold leaf, presses a stylus firmly against a pristine wax tablet, the action caught between creation and defilement, [Detailed Scene & Context: within a sumptuous but oppressive Roman triclinium, where shadows pool beneath a marble table laden with figs and half-empty wine cups; in the background, three other figures are silhouetted against a grand mosaic of the Emperor, their postures tense with conspiracy and envy], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of Caravaggio and Zdzisław Beksiński, combining stark, dramatic chiaroscuro with unsettling, surreal architectural decay, rendered in hyper-realistic oil painting with impasto texture], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, an extreme close-up on the hand and tablet, slightly off-center, with a low-angle view that makes the looming mosaic figure dominant and threatening], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic tenebrism with a single, harsh light source illuminating the hand and tablet from the left, casting long, deep shadows; a palette of bruised purples, oppressive golds, blood red, and cold marble white, with the ink appearing black as pitch], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
